name: Fusion Multi-Launcher, Disposable, Advanced (ADFmL-22)
description: An advanced version of the disposable fusion multi-launcher. This version is constructed of relatively inexpensive materials and has a working lifetime measured in days.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
